hadiths.text: Narrated Anas Ibn Malik:Whenever the Prophet (ﷺ) went for answering the call of nature, I and another boy used to go after him with a staff, a stick or a short spear (or stick) and a tumbler of water and when he finished from answering the call of nature we would hand that tumbler of water to him

chapter.eng-name: To offer As-Salat (the prayer) using an 'Anaza (a spear-headed stick) (as a Sutra)
